feed.title: Category: git | Drew Sheneman - Software Developer

entry.title: Learn Git Commands
entry.content: A fun way to learn Git commands: pcottle.github.io/learnGitBranching/.

entry.title: Git Tools in RubyMine
entry.content:
While I will probably always prefer the command line for git commands over any GUI interface, here is a solid introduction to using the tools that RubyMine provides to make version control more convenient:

pivotallabs.com/everyday-git-commands-in-rubymine/

entry.title: Monitor status of GitHub services
entry.content: GitHub is down, causing an internet-wide questioning of the meaning of life and existential ponderings. Perhaps it is time to discover that thing called ‘outdoors’ everyone seems to talk about. Alternatively, one could go to status.github.com/ and press F5 repeatedly until all is right with the world.
